snippet: One of the great ballet parings of recent years — David Hallberg and Natalia Osipova — will be reunited in New York City this spring during American Ballet Theater’s season at the Metropolitan Opera House.
abstract: One of the great ballet parings of recent years — David Hallberg and Natalia Osipova — will be reunited in New York City this spring during American Ballet Theater’s season at the Metropolitan Opera House.

headline.main: Hallberg and Osipova to Dance Together in American Ballet Theater's Spring Season
headline.print_headline: Hallberg and Osipova To Unite at Ballet Theater
